scripts.copy-libs: mkdir -p assets/vendor/tom-select assets/vendor/highlightjs && cp node_modules/tom-select/dist/js/tom-select.complete.min.js assets/vendor/tom-select/ && cp node_modules/tom-select/dist/css/tom-select.css assets/vendor/tom-select/ && cp node_modules/highlight.js/styles/github-dark.css assets/vendor/highlightjs/ && curl -L https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/highlight.js/11.11.1/highlight.min.js -o assets/vendor/highlightjs/highlight.min.js
